parts.text: {"word":"defend","priority":"★★★","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"守る、防御する、防衛する","english_definition":"to protect someone or something from attack.","examples":[{"sentence":"The soldiers defended the city against the enemy.","translation":"兵士たちは敵から都市を守った。"},{"sentence":"He defended himself with a stick.","translation":"彼は棒で身を守った。"},{"sentence":"The castle was built to defend the region.","translation":"その城は地域を防衛するために建てられた。"}],"collocations":["defend against (～から守る)","defend from (～から守る)","defend oneself (身を守る)","defend a position (陣地を守る)","defend a border (国境を守る)"],"synonyms":["protect","guard","shield","secure","safeguard","preserve"],"antonyms":["attack","assail","invade","offend"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"擁護する、弁護する、支持する","english_definition":"":"to speak or write in favor of someone or something.","examples":[{"sentence":"He defended his friend's actions.","translation":"彼は友人の行動を擁護した。"},{"sentence":"She defended her beliefs passionately.","translation":"彼女は自分の信念を情熱的に擁護した。"},{"sentence":"The lawyer defended his client in court.","translation":"弁護士は法廷で依頼人を弁護した。"}],"collocations":["defend someone's rights (～の権利を擁護する)","defend a policy (政策を擁護する)","defend a decision (決定を擁護する)","defend an argument (議論を擁護する)","defend a point of view (見解を擁護する)"],"synonyms":["support","justify","uphold","vindicate","advocate","champion","stand up for"],"antonyms":["criticize","oppose","condemn","attack","denounce"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vi","definition":"防御する、守る","english_definition":"to act in defense.","examples":[{"sentence":"They fought bravely to defend their homeland.","translation":"彼らは故郷を守るために勇敢に戦った。"},{"sentence":"The team needs to defend better if they want to win.","translation":"チームが勝ちたいなら、もっとうまく守備する必要がある。"}],"collocations":["defend well (うまく守る)","defend bravely (勇敢に守る)","defend effectively (効果的に守る)"],"synonyms":["protect","guard","resist","hold the line"],"antonyms":["attack","advance","yield"]}],"etymology":{"value":"古フランス語の「defendre」（禁止する、守る）に由来し、ラテン語の「defendere」（遠ざける、守る）から派生。de-（～から）+fendere（打つ、攻撃する）という構成で、元々は「攻撃を遠ざける」という意味合いが強かった。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/dɪˈfɛnd/","syllables":"de-fend"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["defend","defends"],"past_simple":"defended","past_participle":"defended","present_participle":"defending"}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**defend**」は、物理的な攻撃から守る場合と、意見や主張を擁護する場合の両方に使われます。物理的な防御では、人、場所、物を守ることを意味し、軍事的な文脈でもよく用いられます。意見や主張の擁護では、言葉や行動を通じて誰かを支持したり、自分の信念を主張したりすることを意味します。自動詞として使われる場合は、主にスポーツなどで守備をする、防御するという意味合いになります。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ I defend to my friend.","correct":"✓ I defend my friend.","note":"「defend」は他動詞であり、目的語を直接取ります。「to」は不要です。"},{"incorrect":"✗ He defended hisself.","correct":"✓ He defended himself.","note":"再帰代名詞は「himself」を使います。"},{"incorrect":"✗ They are defending of their country.","correct":"✓ They are defending their country.","note":"「defend」は他動詞なので、前置詞「of」は不要です。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["defender (名詞: 防御者、擁護者)","defense (名詞: 防御、防衛、擁護)","defensible (形容詞: 防御可能な、擁護可能な)","defenseless (形容詞: 無防備な)","defensively (副詞: 防御的に)"],"phrasal_verbs":["defend against (～から守る)","defend from (～から守る)"],"priority":"★★★"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B1","frequency_google_ngram":"比較的高頻度 (Relatively high frequency)","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B1","text":"「**defend**」は、何かを攻撃から「守る」という意味の動詞です。例えば、国を守ったり、自分の意見を支持したりするときに使います。誰かを「擁護する」という意味もあります。スポーツでは、相手の攻撃から自分のチームのゴールを「守る」という意味で使われます。物理的なものだけでなく、抽象的なものも守ることができる、汎用性の高い単語です。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The goalkeeper **defended** the goal brilliantly.","translation":"ゴールキーパーはゴールを華麗に守った。","type":"verb (vt)","meaning_category":"守る (物理的)"},{"sentence":"She **defended** her thesis with confidence.","translation":"彼女は自信を持って論文を擁護した。","type":"verb (vt)","meaning_category":"擁護する"},{"sentence":"We must **defend** our rights.","translation":"私たちは自分たちの権利を守らなければならない。","type":"verb (vt)","meaning_category":"守る (権利)"},{"sentence":"The soldiers **defended** bravely.","translation":"兵士たちは勇敢に防御した。","type":"verb (vi)","meaning_category":"防御する"},{"sentence":"He **defended** his friend against the accusations.","translation":"彼は非難から友人を擁護した。","type":"verb (vt)","meaning_category":"擁護する"}]}
